string.name: xBlog
string.comment:
xBlog
%s is the name of the user. This is a heading and can be freely translated, but the user's name must be contained within.

string.name: postTitle
string.comment:
postTitle
The title of the post. You can enter it just below the box.

string.name: postIntro
string.comment: postIntro Introduction to a post you are writing.

string.name: postBody
string.comment: postBody The main section of a blog post you are writing.

string.name: published
string.comment: published Confirmation a post has been published.

string.name: publishOnYourBlog
string.comment:
publishOnYourBlog
This is a checkbox [X]
If checked, the post you are writing will be listed on your blog. If not, it will be private, in your draft posts.

resources.string: Se ativado, a postagem será listada no seu blog. Senão, ficará privada, e salva como rascunho

plurals.name: publishedNbBlogPosts
plurals.item: Uma postagem de blog foi feita

string.name: xPublishedY
string.comment:
xPublishedY
%1$s is the name of the user. %2$s is the title of the blog post they published.
Appears in the user's activity feed.

string.name: thisPostIsPublished
string.comment:
thisPostIsPublished
Confirms that a post has already been published i.e. it is not a draft.

string.name: moreBlogPostsBy
string.comment:
moreBlogPostsBy
%s is the author of the blog post.
